### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to connect boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that the positions of the boiler and steam engine are aligned correctly for pipe connections. Verify that there are no obstacles in the way.

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Confirm that the offshore pump is within the effective range of the boiler and that there are no existing pipes obstructing the connection.

### Errors when removing pipes
- Make sure to remove pipes in a sequence that does not disrupt the existing connections. Check the layout before removal to avoid unnecessary disconnections.

### General connection errors
- Always inspect the current layout of entities before attempting to connect or disconnect. This helps in identifying potential issues with connections beforehand.
